name: Flock Off
description:
The sheep have gone and gotten themselves lost, it's all up to this brave dog to get them back home safe. 

A short proof of concept game where you must guide sheep back, all while protecting them from the hazards present in the environment. The dog can fiend for himself, but Nature isn't so kind on the poor fluffy things... 

Play with controller or keyboard 

Controls: 

Move -> Left Analog / Arrow Keys 

Bark -> South Button (A / Cross) / B Key

Restart (Hold) -> North Button (Y / Triangle) / R Key
